# Login
Login API - Basic, Simple and Lightweight

## Use this Template
- Build project
- Go to Swagger site (https://localhost:44381/swagger/index.html)
- Click to "Try it out" Login api:
+ Edit Request body
```json
{
  "Username": "admin",
  "Password": "123321Aa@"
}
```
+ Click to button Execute
+ Result:
Response body with Token
```json
{
  "token": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..U3U4eC8pIFf6wvrPwoA0-9EgM7U9Yom0giNa42G2ur0"
}
```

Finished, your can writing new awesome helper and library now time.
